title: Robots Can't Click
description: Sam, like many of his friends, owns a robot. Robots are cool ... but they can't do everything that Sam and his friends can do. They can't even do really simple things like whistling or finger clicking. When Sam's robot tries to show Sam that it is actually a very clever and useful robot ... it builds a great supercomputer which is capable of doing absolutely anything. With the supercomputer's help, Sam suddenly starts doing very well at school. But one day Sam returns home from school only to find that the great supercomputer has gone missing! Sam and his robot start to search for the missing supercomputer and so begins their extraordinary adventure!
author: CNT Johnson
